first_para: Chuka Harrison Umunna (born 17 October 1978) is a British Labour Party politician who has served Streatham as Member of Parliament (MP) since 2010.

full.extract:
Chuka Harrison Umunna (born 17 October 1978) is a British Labour Party politician who has served Streatham as Member of Parliament (MP) since 2010.
Umunna is the current Shadow Business Secretary since 2011.
full.title: Chuka Umunna
